      <static> load(path, opt_loaded_callback, opt_preloader_callback, wait_resources)

      Load data from blender json file and apply engine global settings
      Parameters:
      Name Type Argument Default Description
      path String Path to JSON file
      opt_loaded_callback <optional>
      		 Callback to execute right after load
      opt_preloader_callback <optional>
      		 Callback to report about loading progress
      wait_resources <optional>
      		 false Wait until all resources loaded
      Source:
      • ext/data.js, line 12

      <static> load_and_add_new()

      Deprecated:
      • Use load() instead
        Source:
        • ext/data.js, line 21

        <static> set_debug_resources_root(debug_resources_root)

        Set resources root for debug purposes. Enables check of loading paths, so if resources are not loaded from the app root there will be warning in m_print.
        Parameters:
        Name Type Description
        debug_resources_root String App root directory.
        Source:
        • ext/data.js, line 49

        <static> unload()

        Unload previously loaded data.
